price: Diles: "No tengo poder personal para desviarlos ni para guiarlos por el camino recto".
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَآ أَمۡلِكُ لَكُمۡ ضَرّٗا وَلَا رَشَدٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qul innī lā amliku lakum ḍarran walā rashadan
